questions.question: Which step in the SEM methodology involves optimizing the detection of backscattered electrons to provide compositional contrast in an image?
What is the primary purpose of the Through-Lens Detection (TLD) mode in SEM?

answers.a: To detect phase distributions and compositional variations
answers.b: To enhance detection efficiency and reduce noise in imaging
answers.c: To analyze crystallographic orientation through diffraction patterns
answers.d: To perform elemental mapping and compositional analysis
